CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRAND_ID = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ASSIGNMENT_ASSISTANT_ID = #{record.assignmentAssistantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
